careerBank.description: Provides healthcare and assistance to patients.

quizQuestions.question: Do you enjoy working with numbers and data?

answersMapping.Yes: Consider careers in Data Science, Accounting, or Engineering
answersMapping.No: Explore careers in Creative Arts or Communication
answersMapping.Sometimes: You might enjoy a mix like Marketing Analytics

quizQuestions.question: Do you like working with people?

answersMapping.Yes: Teaching, Sales, and Counseling may suit you
answersMapping.No: Consider careers in Research or Software Development

videos.title: How to Choose a Career Path

successStories.name: Jane Doe
successStories.story: Jane started her own business after years of working in tech and now mentors young founders.

guidanceTopics.title: Preparing for University Admission
guidanceTopics.content: Step-by-step guidance on writing personal statements, preparing for entrance exams, and building a strong application profile.

guidanceTopics.title: Career Coaching Sessions
guidanceTopics.content: Book one-on-one sessions with certified career coaches to explore career options and create an action plan.
